Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (Why would a child need that much?)

Choices.Choice2: Ask if he takes them regularly?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Do you need help with... that?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: Do you need to take these every day?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: Thanks for asking me. I almost forgot.
Speaker.line2: Usually, it's Eve who reminds me.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: Why didn't you tell me, sis?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Disappoint
Speaker.line1: Ugh, I'm tired of these medicines.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Disappoint
Speaker.line1: I don't want to take them anymore!

Choices.Choice1: Skipping a day might be fine

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: It will good for your body.
Speaker.line2: I believe you can do it.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Just one day might be fine.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line2: I guess I must take these anyway...

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line2: I've had to eat these since I was a toddler.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: And that will help you get better.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: I forgot to eat them once when I was about five,

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Disappoint
Speaker.line1: Right? And I've had to eat these since I was a toddler.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: It's so boring that some days I almost forgot.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: So Eve needs to remind me every day, right sis?

Choices.Choice1: Ask if she ever get this sick
Choices.Choice2: Ask about taking care of her brother
Choices.Choice3: Ask if she also need to take these

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Do you also need to take these, Miss Hartington?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: You must have taken care of Mr. Hartington a lot when you were all younger.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Have you ever been this sick, Miss Hartington?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: I don't want her to become ill like me.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line1: [After a long whine, Nathaniel finally takes his medicines.]

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Disappoint
Speaker.line2: I eat these every day, and I still hate it to my gut.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Sad
Speaker.line3: I want to eat that sweet pastry right now.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: But if I leave, the tea will also turn bitter.
Speaker.line2: You wouldn't want bitter tea, right?

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: But seriously, I think Eve must be hungry by now.
Speaker.line2: It would be nice if she gets to eat soon!
